content: The opportunity involves roadway widening and reconstruction in Montgomery County, New York. The work requires providing labor, materials, machinery, equipment, and other means of construction necessary to complete the project. The due date for bids is February 23, 2023, at 2:00 PM. The contract term is not specified. The opportunity is not a Service-Disabled Veteran-Owned Set Aside. The technical contact for the project is Chris Cornwell, Project Manager at GPI. The primary contact for the project is Jaclyn Hernigle, Purchasing Agent for Montgomery County. No substantially similar contracts have been awarded in the past five years.
